iris.load.failure.generic: Oculus encountered an issue trying to load the shader; please report this to Oculus developers.
notenoughcrashes.midnightconfig.catchGam: This will be always disabled (even if the config is set to true) when Iris is installed.
If false, NEC won't attempt to prevent the game from closing when it crashes.
notenoughcrashes.midnightconfig.catchIni: This will be always disabled (even if true) when certain mods are installed.
(Fabric Only) If false, the game will close normally when it fails to initialize,
and will not display a special crash screen.
iris.load.failure.shader: The shaderpack failed to load! Please report the error to the shader developer.
notenoughcrashes.midnightconfig.title: Not Enough Crashes Configuration
options.iris.colorSpace.sodium_tooltip: The color space to transform the screen to. Works on top of shader packs. Use SRGB if unsure.
notenoughcrashes.midnightconfig.disableR: If true, the "Return To Main Menu" button will be disabled when crashing,
meaning you cannot recover from a crash.
notenoughcrashes.midnightconfig.crashLim: How many times NEC will try to prevent the game from closing in one session.
notenoughcrashes.midnightconfig.debugMod: If true, additional info will be logged for the mod developer.
